about_the_game:
It's a ready-to-go game designed to help you relax and find calmness. There are no complicated mechanics to learn, no timers and you're free to travel wherever you want to. You, your cat, your cozy ride, beautiful landscapes, and some hitchhikers with great stories.




Endless adventure:
A procedurally generated map that never ends. Start with story mode, then switch to zen mode for an endless, uniquely generated ride that lasts as long as you want. Plus, a background mode will be added, allowing you to let the game run with cinematic cameras to set the perfect mood for your space.

Customization:
Make it feel like home, cause it's going to be your home :)

Cooking:
The van features a mini kitchen, allowing you to prepare meals and drinks at any time for yourself and your fellow road travelers, warming their hearts if you wish.

Pets:
Your cat will go on this journey with you. Also, you can pet every cute animal that you find on your way.

Fully interactive car and cockpit:
Everything in your car is interactive. Turn the key, pull the handbrake, turn on the lights, play the music, turn on windshield blades to fully immerse yourself into the car adventure mood. You even have to fuel down your car and quickly fix it if you use it the wrong way.

Points of Interest along the way:
You'll meet many points of interest across the way to add variety and interest to your adventure: meet your friends, find gas stations and stores, panoramic viewpoints, parking lots, etc.

Weather and daytime systems:
You can experience the changing day/night cycle with impressive effects which will make you stop the car and just enjoy it.

Music:
The game has a lot of great, great, greeeat music, from artists like Rosentwig, Purrple Cat, Sage Nine, Marlon Schettert and more.
Also, you can add to the radio your own songs, if you want.

Join our Discord!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A game made for you to relax while hitting the road! Dive into a heartwarming journey of friendship, loss, and reunion. Drive, customize, and upgrade your cozy van as you explore ever-changing roads through immersive landscapes.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
